sense.def:
Kadar je človek
favourable to something
, se z nečim strinja ali tisto odobrava.

seg.quote: Her request met with a favourable response.
Many reacted favourably to the plan.

sense.def:
To make a favourable impression on someone
pomeni, da je nekomu nekaj všeč ali tisto odobrava.

seg.quote: Her application had impressed him very favourably.

sense.def:
To present something in a favourable light
pomeni truditi se, da bi bilo nekaj ljudem predstavljeno tako, da bi jim bilo všeč ali da bi tisto odobravali.

Okoliščine, ki so
favourable
, povečujejo verjetnost, da bo nekaj uspelo.

seg.quote: This creates an atmosphere favourable to expansion.

sense.def:
To make a favourable comparison between two things
pomeni trditi, da je prva stvar vsaj tako dobra kot druga.

seg.quote: ...a service which compares favourably with that of other countries.
